body_html: I made the RegList stuff more type safe so you no longer have to guess Bool/Int and you have to try harder to screw up appending to a list. I tried to do more aggressive changes like create a ContiguousListPool objects, there are some optimizations that remove indirections when accessing these lists that make these changes difficult to encapsulate.
body_text: I made the RegList stuff more type safe so you no longer have to guess Bool/Int and you have to try harder to screw up appending to a list.  I tried to do more aggressive changes like create a ContiguousListPool objects, there are some optimizations that remove indirections when accessing these lists that make these changes difficult to encapsulate.
body: I made the RegList stuff more type safe so you no longer have to guess Bool/Int and you have to try harder to screw up appending to a list.  I tried to do more aggressive changes like create a ContiguousListPool objects, there are some optimizations that remove indirections when accessing these lists that make these changes difficult to encapsulate.
